analysis.description:
Reentrancy in VIVAVestingVault.release (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#606-639):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(this) >= toRelease) (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#617-619)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#622-625)
bonus in VIVACrowdsaleRound.addBonus (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#710) is a local variable never initialiazed

VIVACrowdsaleData.finalize (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#924-932) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#930)

CrowdsaleUtils.getCurrentRound has external calls inside a loop:
	- i < data.getNumRounds() (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#1052-1071)

CrowdsaleUtils.getCurrentRound has external calls inside a loop:
	- inTimeRange = valuationDate >= time && valuationDate < time.add(data.rounds(i).capAtDuration()) (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#1056-1059)

CrowdsaleUtils.getCurrentRound has external calls inside a loop:
	- inCapRange = weiRaisedForSale < data.rounds(i).capAtWei() (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#1059-1063)

CrowdsaleUtils.getCurrentRound has external calls inside a loop:
	- data.rounds(i) (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#1064-1065)

CrowdsaleUtils.getCurrentRound has external calls inside a loop:
	- time = time.add(data.rounds(i).capAtDuration()) (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#1071)

CrowdsaleUtils.getCurrentRound has external calls inside a loop:
	- data.rounds(i) (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#1069-1070)

Reentrancy in VIVACrowdsaleData.registerPurchase (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#888-914):
	External calls:
	- round.refundable() (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#897-902)
	- refundVault.deposit.value(msg.value)(beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#898-900)
	External calls sending eth:
	- refundVault.deposit.value(msg.value)(beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#898-900)
	- wallet.transfer(msg.value) (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#901)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- mintedForSaleTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#908-909)
	- weiContributed (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#903-905)
	- weiRaisedForSale (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#905-908)

VIVAToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#520-523)
VIVAToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#518-519)
VIVAToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#519-520)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/13/0x887a663d4e426c0382605932c2a91bd70043ef0b.sol#1): it allows old versions
